reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 145/95: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY OF MINISTER TO APPROVE CONDOMINIUM DESCRIPTIONS
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY OF MINISTER TO APPROVE CONDOMINIUM DESCRIPTIONS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 145/95: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY OF MINISTER TO APPROVE CONDOMINIUM DESCRIPTIONS
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. (1) All authority of the Minister to approve condominium descriptions under section 50 of the Condominium Act is hereby delegated to the council of each of the municipalities listed in Schedule 1 in respect of all of the land situate in the municipality. O. Reg. 145/95, s. 1 (1). (2) The delegation is subject to the following conditions: 1.  Revoked: O. Reg. 434/96, s. 1 (1). 2. If any of the authority delegated to a council is in turn delegated by a council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 145/95, s. 1 (2); O. Reg. 434/96, s. 1 (1). (3) The delegation does not apply to an application made before March 28, 1995. O. Reg. 434/96, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) All authority of the Minister to approve condominium descriptions under section 50 of the Condominium Act is hereby delegated to the council of each of the municipalities listed in Schedule 1 in respect of all of the land situate in the municipality. O. Reg. 145/95, s. 1 (1).

(2) The delegation is subject to the following conditions:

1. Revoked: O. Reg. 434/96, s. 1 (1).

2. If any of the authority delegated to a council is in turn delegated by a council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 145/95, s. 1 (2); O. Reg. 434/96, s. 1 (1).

(3) The delegation does not apply to an application made before March 28, 1995. O. Reg. 434/96, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that a condition in subsection 1 (2) is not complied with.  O. Reg. 145/95, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that a condition in subsection 1 (2) is not complied with.  O. Reg. 145/95, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 145/95, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 145/95, s. 3.

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 145/95, s. 4. Schedule 1 1.-3.  Revoked: O. Reg. 434/96, s. 2. 4. The Municipality of Metropolitan Toronto. 5. The Town of Orangeville. O. Reg. 145/95, Sched. 1; O. Reg. 434/96, s. 2. SCHEDULE 2 Revoked: O. Reg. 434/96, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 145/95, s. 4.

Schedule 1

1.-3. Revoked: O. Reg. 434/96, s. 2.

4. The Municipality of Metropolitan Toronto.

5. The Town of Orangeville. O. Reg. 145/95, Sched. 1; O. Reg. 434/96, s. 2.

SCHEDULE 2 Revoked: O. Reg. 434/96, s. 3.
